description: The night sky put on a spectacular show around the globe on Tuesday evening as the "pink" April supermoon -- the biggest and brightest of the year -- was visible for millions.
title: April's pink supermoon in pictures -- from California to Krakow
title_page: Pink supermoon in pictures -- the best shots from around the world - CNN
maintext:
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The full moon rises above the horizon in San Francisco, California. Hide Caption 1 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures A bald eagle sits near its nest while the super pink moon rises in the distance at Chatfield State Park in Littleton, Colorado. Hide Caption 2 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures A plane passes the pink supermoon as it rises over Dublin, Ireland. Hide Caption 3 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The supermoon rises behind Rocca Calascio castle in Italy. Hide Caption 4 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The pink supermoon rises over the Rock of Dunamase in Laois, Ireland. Hide Caption 5 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The moon rises behind New York City. Hide Caption 6 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The moon rises in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Hide Caption 7 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The moon takes on a reddish hue as it reflects the light of early dawn in Krakow, southern Poland. Hide Caption 8 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The full moon rises above Salgo castle in Hungary. Hide Caption 9 of 11
Photos: The April pink supermoon in pictures The pink supermoon is seen above San Telmo in Spain's Balearic Islands in the early hours of April 8. Hide Caption 10 of 11
